title: Robot falcon puts the frighteners on nuisance birds
text:
Robot falcon puts the frighteners on nuisance birds 6:32am EDT - 01:54
A robotic bird of prey that mimics the flight of a real peregrine falcon has been developed by a spin-off company from the University of Twente to help tackle the problem of bird strikes at airports. Matthew Stock reports.
A robotic bird of prey that mimics the flight of a real peregrine falcon has been developed by a spin-off company from the University of Twente to help tackle the problem of bird strikes at airports. Matthew Stock reports. //reut.rs/2H7KI5J
